name: A Steamy Job
description:
The year is 1925... You are travelling as a mechanic with your crew on the way to the central city, Aetherthain with vital supplies for the city´s survival. But your airship´s engine is malfunctioning and you as the only engineer must keep it running until you reach Aetherthain!

Controles:
Move -WASD

Swing wrench - Mousbutton 1

Jump - Space

Goal: 

Keep the engine running until you reach your destination. Good luck

Credits: 

Scripting and Gameplay logic - Emil Valentin, Mathias Frost Jørgensen

Art - Sashana Sivasothy

Music and Sound Effects - Leon Groth
